body_html:
I guess the problem is as follows, resided in Caffe2 ...

 CMake Warning at caffe2/CMakeLists.txt:198 (add_library):
   Cannot generate a safe runtime search path for target caffe2 because there
   is a cycle in the constraint graph:

     dir 0 is [/usr/local/cuda/lib64]
     dir 1 is [/usr/local/lib]
       dir 4 must precede it due to runtime library [libmkldnn.so.0]
     dir 2 is [/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib]
     dir 3 is [/opt/intel/mkl/lib/intel64]
     dir 4 is [....../pytorch/build/lib]
       dir 1 must precede it due to runtime library [libmkldnn.so.0]

   Some of these libraries may not be found correctly.

body:
I guess the problem is as follows, resided in Caffe2 ...


```
 CMake Warning at caffe2/CMakeLists.txt:198 (add_library):
   Cannot generate a safe runtime search path for target caffe2 because there
   is a cycle in the constraint graph:

     dir 0 is [/usr/local/cuda/lib64]
     dir 1 is [/usr/local/lib]
       dir 4 must precede it due to runtime library [libmkldnn.so.0]
     dir 2 is [/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib]
     dir 3 is [/opt/intel/mkl/lib/intel64]
     dir 4 is [....../pytorch/build/lib]
       dir 1 must precede it due to runtime library [libmkldnn.so.0]

   Some of these libraries may not be found correctly.
```
